rooms.description: Traditional Kerala Nalukettu entrance featuring an open verandah with wooden columns. The entrance is aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Spacious living room centered in the Nalukettu layout with exposed brick walls and wooden finishes, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Integrated kitchen space adjacent to the living area, following local design norms with a central hearth and proper exhaust system aligned with Vastu guidelines for fire element.
Primary bedroom with private verandah, oriented as per Vastu to ensure stability and privacy. Features include traditional Kerala-style doors and windows.
Additional sleeping area designed with ample natural light and ventilation in alignment with Vastu principles for relaxation.
Cozy library space featuring built-in bookshelves and a reading nook. Oriented towards the east to receive early morning light as per Vastu.
Functional bathroom attached near both master and guest bedrooms. Features include traditional Kerala fixtures and adequate ventilation.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed with wooden carvings, ensuring a welcoming entry as per Vastu principles.
Large window providing natural light and ventilation to the living area, positioned according to traditional design norms.
Window ensuring privacy with subtle designs that blend modern and traditional aesthetics.
Small balcony providing a private outdoor space following Vastu guidelines for fresh air and sunlight.

rooms.description: Enhanced master bedroom with an elevated view of the surroundings. Traditional Kerala elements are preserved.
Additional guest bedroom on the first floor featuring ample natural light and ventilation per Vastu principles.
Small storage area for household essentials, designed to maintain clutter-free living spaces.

openings.description: Winding staircase providing access between floors with traditional wooden steps and railings.
